rows.label: tlk45320651_01_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm from the Operations Testing
Department.

rows.label: tlk45320651_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Our main job is to test new equipment
developed by Central R&D.

rows.label: tlk45320651_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Things like guns and armor for
the regular infantry.

rows.label: tlk45320651_01_msg0004
rows.name:
The Imperial Army doesn't have
all that many Drivers.

rows.label: tlk45320651_01_msg0005
rows.name:
So developing powerful weapons
that anyone can use is an important
investment of resources.

rows.label: tlk45320651_01_msg0006
rows.name:
...I guess that doesn't have much
to do with you though, huh?

rows.label: tlk45320651_01_msg0007
rows.name:
All you need to be able to dominate
in combat is your Blades and maybe
a few Core Chips. It's not fair, really.
